name: E.B.H.O
description:
Made in 10 days for the 8 Bits to Infinity Mouse Jam

Perhaps overly eager to test experimental and dangerous technology, set off into space with only the volatile forces of a black hole on a diplomatic mission to visit alien worlds

- TEAM -

Character Design and Art by Shepherd - @MushiShepherd (Twitter/Instagram)

Programming and Additional Art by KassieKitsune, Greedy Eve and SleepyLil - @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Music and Sounds by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp
